description:
Carl visits Lee-Leng to find him weary and worn out. Knowing what has happened, in order to help Kajika, he starts to encourage Lee-Leng not to give up on her. On the other hand, Kajika, Harry, and Fred rush to Machaty, after receiving notice that he is in critical condition.  Kajika receives words of encouragement from Machaty and comes up with a clever plan all of a sudden and asks Harry to cut ties with her. Kajika explains to him that there is something worth giving up everything for, but suddenly Eugene appears before Kajika.
Source: crunchyroll
